job_details.Functieomschrijving:
CyberArk is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team responsible for the CyberArk is looking for a senior software engineer to join our elite team which is responsible for building a platform that serves all CyberArk's SaaS products.

   In this role, you will be using AWS serverless architecture, AWS CDK &Python to design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production.

   The team works in full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams. Together we produce complex and advanced platforms that meet the highest security standards and NFRs.

   We are looking forward for an energetic and versatile person to join our family and help us achieve our goals.
     * Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment
     * Design and implement the infrastructure of the system.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources.
     * Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to foster a culture of learning and innovation.
     * Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
     * Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer- SaaS Platform

CyberArk is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team responsible for the CyberArk is looking for a senior software engineer to join our elite team which is responsible for building a platform that serves all CyberArk's SaaS products.

   In this role, you will be using AWS serverless architecture, AWS CDK &Python to design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production.

   The team works in full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams. Together we produce complex and advanced platforms that meet the highest security standards and NFRs.

   We are looking forward for an energetic and versatile person to join our family and help us achieve our goals.
     * Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment
     * Design and implement the infrastructure of the system.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources.
     * Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to foster a culture of learning and innovation.
     * Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
     * Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering and cloud infrastructure (AWS serverless, CDK, Python) for a SaaS platform. While it mentions developing and deploying machine learning models and AI algorithms, it lacks specific details about generative AI, LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer. The core responsibilities and technologies described align more with a general software engineering or MLOps role rather than a specialized ML or GenAI Engineer. The role is primarily about building and maintaining a platform, with AI/ML as a component rather than the central focus.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production', 'Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment', 'Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance', and 'Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms'. These all point to core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions practicing 'all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment', which is a fundamental aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and implement the infrastructure of the system' falls under the broader umbrella of software development, especially when building a platform.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement the infrastructure of the system

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states 'Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes', which directly relates to model development and deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources' points to operational aspects of managing deployed services.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaboration with 'security architects, product managers, and other development teams' and providing 'technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members', indicating strong communication and collaboration needs.
job_tasks.phrase: full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions' and providing 'technical leadership' suggests a proactive and innovative approach.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'foster a culture of learning and innovation' and 'Explore new technologies and tools' implies a need for continuous learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: foster a culture of learning and innovation

job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on 'continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance' are core tenets of modern software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance

soft_skills.phrase: full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams
foster a culture of learning and innovation
